alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; Western Columbia River Gorge (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 12 at 9:54PM PDT until April 13 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, with the heaviest totals above 500 feet in elevation. * WHERE...In Oregon, Upper Hood River Valley, Western Columbia River Gorge and Central Columbia River Gorge. In Washington, Western Columbia River Gorge and Central Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most likely period for accumulating snow appears to be between 3 AM and 9 AM Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Western Columbia River Gorge
